attributes.action: Prisions should be awful criminals never want to go back
attributes.additional_details:
Our prisons are in great condition. Prisoners are given access to TVs, game consoles and pool tables. Why? They should cleaning the toilet or ome other awful job.
They are given fancy foods. Why?
Prisoner should be given rice and gruel. Some prisoners live better conidtions in prison than on he outside. This MUST change.

Please address this. It will be cheaper too. These people do not deserve the same human rights. They broke the law and the morals of society.
